metadata.title: Super Shield - Premium Car Heat Insulation
metadata.description: Super Shield is a Saudi brand specialized in high-quality car heat insulation rolls with advanced features and competitive prices. Locally made and tested under the sun.
metadata.keywords: car heat insulation, thermal shield, Saudi Arabia, car protection, heat protection, window tinting
metadata.author: Super Shield
metadata.ogTitle: Super Shield - Premium Car Heat Insulation
metadata.ogDescription: The first thermal shield designed specifically for the harsh Saudi heat. Join over 300,000 satisfied customers.

Footer.tagline: Locally made and tested under the sun â€” the first thermal shield designed specifically for the harsh Saudi heat. Join over 300,000 satisfied customers enjoying coolness and protection.
Footer.returnPolicyDescription: Our return policy ensures customer satisfaction with clear guidelines for returns and exchanges.
Footer.returnWindowText: You have 30 days from the date of purchase to return your product for a full refund or exchange.
Footer.condition1: Product must be in original packaging
Footer.condition2: No signs of installation or damage
Footer.step2: Provide order details and reason for return
Footer.step3: Receive return authorization and shipping label
Footer.step4: Ship the product back to us
Footer.contactInfoText: For questions about returns, contact our customer service team via WhatsApp or email.
Footer.warrantyDescription: Our warranty policy covers manufacturing defects and ensures product quality for 5 years.
Footer.warrantyIncludes1: Abnormal color change of the film
Footer.warrantyIncludes2: Peeling or cracking of the outer layer
Footer.warrantyDurationText: 5 years from the date of purchase
Footer.warrantyExcludes1: Improper installation or damage from misuse
Footer.warrantyExcludes2: Scratches or cuts from sharp tools or improper cleaning
Footer.warrantyExcludes3: Exposure to excessive heat beyond normal usage
Footer.replacementConditions1: Original purchase invoice must be provided
Footer.replacementConditions2: Submit a portion of the damaged roll for inspection
Footer.replacementConditions3: Company reserves the right to replace the product, warranty does not include installation or removal costs

Us.title: Why Choose Super Shield?
